nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Patchy freezing fog. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 28. Southwest wind around 2 mph.

nws.name: Friday
nws.shortForecast: Patchy Freezing Fog then Slight Chance Rain Showers
nws.detailedForecast: Patchy freezing fog before 9am, then patchy fog between 9am and noon, then a slight chance of rain showers. Partly sunny, with a high near 49. South wind 2 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Patchy Fog
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 8pm, then rain showers likely and patchy fog between 8pm and 10pm, then patchy fog and a slight chance of rain showers between 10pm and 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 39. Southwest wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Light Rain
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain after 1pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 46. Northwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Rain and patchy fog. Cloudy, with a low around 38. Northeast wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.detailedForecast: Rain. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 42. Northwest wind 6 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 1am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 28. West wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.
